title: Another Golang Crypto Miner On the Loose
description: There are many crypto mining malware variants infecting systems on the internet. On Friday, March 4, 2021, I noticed an interesting hit in my honeypot logs.  The binary it captured stood out, as it was rather large at 4MB.  I immediately thought it would be a crypto miner written in the Go language. I was correct. This one however, has some newer exploits it's using for proliferation.
author: Larry Cashdollar
